item.title: Knape & Vogt Recalls Office Workstations Due to Injury Hazard
item.description: The workstation can malfunction, causing the gas cylinders to separate and forcefully discharge, posing an injury hazard.

item.title: Havertys Recalls Entertainment Hutches Due to Injury Hazard
item.description: The top shelf can fall, posing an injury hazard to consumers.

item.title: Imagine Nation Books Recalls Wireless Charging Pads Due to Burn Hazard
item.description: The wireless phone chargers can overheat while in use, posing a burn hazard.

item.title: South Shore Furniture Recalls Chest of Drawers Due to Serious Tip-Over and Entrapment Hazards; One Fatality Reported
item.description: The recalled chests are unstable if they are not anchored to the wall, posing serious tip-over and entrapment hazards that can result in death or injuries to children.

item.title: Igloo Recalls Marine Coolers Due to Entrapment and Suffocation Hazards
item.description: The cooler’s stainless-steel latch can automatically lock when the lid is closed, allowing a person to become locked inside the air tight container, posing entrapment and suffocation hazards.

item.title: FIRMAN Power Equipment Recalls Portable Generators Due to Fire Hazard; Sold Exclusively at Costco (Recall Alert)
item.description: The generator’s carbon canister can leak gas, posing a fire hazard.

item.title: BRP Recalls Snowmobiles Due to Fuel Leak and Fire Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The vehicle’s fuel delivery system can leak fuel, posing a fire hazard.

item.title: Greenfield World Trade Recalls Food Dehydrators Due to Fire Hazard
item.description: The food dehydrator can overheat, posing a fire hazard

item.title: Starbucks Recalls Bodum Recycled Coffee Presses Due to Laceration Hazard
item.description: The coffee press’ plunger knob can break and expose the metal rod, posing a laceration hazard.

item.title: DAVIDsTEA Recalls Valentine’s Day Stackable Mugs Due to Fire Hazard
item.description: The mugs were mislabeled as microwave safe. If microwaved, the metallic print on the mug can spark, posing a fire hazard.

item.title: Tween Brands Recalls Light Up Bed Canopies Due to Fire and Burn Hazards; Sold Exclusively at Justice (Recall Alert)
item.description: The canopy lights can overheat, posing fire and burn hazards.

item.title: Kids II Recalls All Rocking Sleepers Due to Reports of Deaths
item.description: Infant fatalities have occurred in the Rocking Sleepers, after the infants rolled from their back to their stomach while unrestrained, or under other circumstances.

item.title: TriDerma Recalls Pain Relief Cream Due to Failure to Meet Child Resistant Closure Requirement; Risk of Poisoning (Recall Alert)
item.description: The packaging is not child resistant as required by the Poison Prevention Packaging Act. The pain relieving cream contains lidocaine, posing a risk of poisoning to young children if they put it on their skin or ingest it.

item.title: Viessmann Recalls Boilers Due to Carbon Monoxide Hazard
item.description: The boiler heat exchanger back plate can corrode and leak flue gases, allowing the boiler to emit excessive amounts of carbon monoxide, posing a CO poisoning hazard to consumers.

item.title: Ruggable Recalls Shag Rugs Due to Violation of Federal Flammability Standard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The rug’s shag cover fails to meet the federal flammability standard for carpets and rugs, posing a fire hazard.

item.title: Flying Tiger Copenhagen Recalls Toy Train Carts Due to Choking Hazard
item.description: The steam dome on the toy train’s engine car can come loose, posing a choking hazard

item.title: Bodum Recalls Stove Top Espresso Makers Due to Fire and Burn Hazards
item.description: The espresso maker’s handle can ignite from the flame of a gas stove, posing fire and burn hazards.

item.title: Arctic Cat Recalls Snowmobiles Due to Fire Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: While operating the snowmobile the exhaust can flame from the muffler outlet, posing a fire hazard.

item.title: Tekno Products Recalls Tuff Smoke-Less Grills Due to Fire and Burn Hazards
item.description: The grill can overheat, posing fire and burn hazards.

item.title: Target Recalls Wooden Toy Vehicles Due to Choking Hazard
item.description: The wheels on the vehicles can detach, posing a choking hazard to children

item.title: RH Recalls Callum Canopy Beds Due to Injury Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The bed’s horizontal canopy rails can detach and fall, posing an injury hazard.

item.title: Go Couture Recalls Children’s Loungewear Due to Violation of Federal Flammability Standard
item.description: The children’s loungewear sets fail to meet the federal flammability standard for children’s sleepwear, posing a risk of burn injuries to children.

item.title: Heat Hero Recalls Portable Plug-in Heaters Due to Fire and Burn Hazards (Recall Alert)
item.description: The heater can overheat, smoke and catch fire, posing fire and burn hazards.

item.title: MTD Recalls Lawn Mowers Due to Injury Hazard; Sold Exclusively at Lowe’s (Recall Alert)
item.description: Sharp objects can pierce through the lawn mower’s collecting bag during use and strike a user or bystander, posing an injury hazard to consumers.

item.title: H&M Recalls Children’s Bathrobes Due to Violation of Flammability Standard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The children’s hooded bathrobes fail to meet the flammability standard for children’s sleepwear, posing a risk of burn injuries to children.

item.title: Fisher-Price Recalls Rock ‘n Play Sleepers Due to Reports of Deaths
item.description: Infant fatalities have occurred in Rock ‘n Play Sleepers, after the infants rolled from their back to their stomach or side while unrestrained, or under other circumstances.

item.title: Specialized Recalls Bicycles with Steerer Tube Collars Due to Fall and Injury Hazards
item.description: The bicycle’s steerer tube collar can crack if exposed to corrosion resulting in sudden loss of steering control, posing fall and injury hazards to the rider.

item.title: DICK’S Sporting Goods Recalls Hunters’ Tree Stands Due to Fall Hazard
item.description: The weld on the seats can break and cause the seat to fall from the tree, posing a fall hazard.

item.title: KTM and Husqvarna Motorcycles Recall Motorcycles Due to Crash Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The throttle can become stuck in the open position, posing a crash hazard to the rider.

item.title: Marpac Recalls Sound Machines Due to Burn Hazard
item.description: The sound machine’s internal battery can leak and cause an electrical short, posing a burn hazard.

item.title: Vivitar Recalls Hot/Cold Massage Balls Due to Burn Hazard; Sold Exclusively at Target
item.description: The massage balls can leak or rupture during or after microwaving, posing a burn hazard to consumers.

item.title: Quality Bicycle Products Recalls Bicycles Due To Injury Hazard
item.description: The bicycle’s fork legs can break, posing an injury hazard.

item.title: Matco Tools Wireless Chargers Recalled by Professional Tool Products Due to Burn Hazard
item.description: The wireless chargers can overheat, posing a burn hazard.

item.title: Spector & Co. Recalls Power Bank Chargers Due to Fire Hazard
item.description: The charger can overheat while recharging, posing a fire hazard.

item.title: Amerex Group Recalls Infant Fur Jackets Due to Choking Hazard
item.description: The jacket’s snaps can detach, posing a choking hazard to young children.

item.title: Ocean Reef Recalls Neptune Space Integrated Diving Masks Due to Injury Hazard
item.description: The diving mask regulator can cause restricted airflow, posing an injury hazard to divers.

item.title: John Deere Recalls Attachment Kits for Compact Utility Tractor Snow Blowers and Brooms Due to Injury Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The Attachment Kits are missing the product Operator's Manual which details proper attachment and use of the product, posing an injury hazard.

item.title: Midwest-CBK Recalls Baby Rattle Socks Due to Choking Hazard
item.description: Small ornaments can detach from the socks, posing a choking hazard to young children.

item.title: Interline Brands Recalls Swivel Fittings Due to Fire Hazard
item.description: The fittings can leak, posing a fire hazard.

item.title: Cambridge Elevating Recalls Home Elevators Due to Fall Hazard
item.description: The landing door on the elevators can unlock without the elevator present, posing a fall hazard.
